page.title: 13HEALTH/SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
page.content:
{ROODLANDS HOSPITAL}:This is a General Hospital which serves the whole of East Lothian. It has a 24 hour Accident and Emergency Service.
{NEWTONPORT CLINIC}:This, when completed, will house general medical staff serving the district.
{OTHER}:There is also a psychiatric hospital, Herdmanflat, and several old peoples homes.
{SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY}: Technological developments in Haddington include 2 firms dealing with electrical appliances:- {Mitsubishi}- televisions. {Lemac}- light engineering eg electric motors,computer keyboards for IBM.
